content.detail: Onboarded and shepherded the launch of two Press Sites managed by different Disney Marketing Teams in the U.S. specifically covering Disney+ Press and Disney Advertising Press. Trained the teams' site producers on how to utilize the out-of-box tools provided through the proprietary CMS that I am product manager for. Coordinated the launch of this site with our infrastructure team.

images.alt: Homepage of different content links for Disney+ Press site
Homepage of different content links for Disney Advertising Press site
